document.full_text: kobe bryant barely made a ripple on offense for the los angeles lakers. he was too busy ensuring chris paul didn't make another huge splash that could have put the lakers in a cavernous playoff hole.
document.title: lakers 87, hornets 78: lakers grind past hornets, even playoff series
lines_and_colors: kobe bryant barely made a ripple on offense for the los angeles lakers. he was too busy ensuring chris paul didn't make another huge splash that could have put the lakers in a cavernous playoff hole.
